pageProduct.name: Sambucol Immune Everyday 60 Capsules
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Sambucol Immune Defence Everyday Capsules to support immune health to fight illness. Get Better Faster with Sambucol.

Sambucol Immune Defence Everyday is a unique Immune support formula which combines Premium Black Elderberry & Astragalus, 1000 mg Vitamin C per day, Zinc & Vitamin D3 to help support your immune system to fight illness & reduce the severity of Cold & Flu symptoms so you can get back to being YOU faster.

Suitable For: Adults only

Size: 60 Capsules

Serving Size: 2 Capsules daily

Warnings

Contains zinc which may be dangerous if taken in large amounts or for a long period. Adults only.

Ingredients

Each Capsule Contains:
Sambucus nigra (Black Elderberry) fruit juice dry 10mg
equiv. to fresh juice 350mg
Astragalus membranaceus (Astragalus) root ext. dry conc. 10mg
equiv. to fresh root 200mg
Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C) 500mg
Zinc (as Zinc Citrate Dihydrate) 12.5mg
Colecalciferol (Vitamin D3) 7.5micrograms (300IU)

Contains: Each Capsule Contains:
Sambucus nigra (Black Elderberry) fruit juice dry 10mg
equiv. to fresh juice 350mg
Astragalus membranaceus (Astragalus) root ext. dry conc. 10mg
equiv. to fresh root 200mg
Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C) 500mg
Zinc (as Zinc Citrate Dihydrate) 12.5mg
Colecalciferol (Vitamin D3) 7.5micrograms (300IU)

Allergen Contains: Sulphites

Allergen May Be Present: Null

Allergen Free From: n/a

Directions

Adults: Take 2 capsules daily.
Best taken regularly or as prescribed by your health professional.

Vitamin and mineral supplements should not replace a balanced diet. Contains Zinc which may be dangerous if taken in large amounts of for a longer period. Adults only.

Do not use if tamper evident seal is broken. Store below 25°C.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25C. Do not use if tamper evident seal if broken.
